title: Women's Wellbeing & Cosmetic acupuncture | Julie Millour | Málaga
description: Hormonal Balance, Menstrual Awareness, Fertility, Nutrition, Herbal Medicine, Cosmetic Acupuncture, Julie Millour, acupuncture malaga
cleaned_text: top of page Strenghten your digestion Regulate your sleep Reduce stress Balance your hormones Look younger I believe hormone balance is rooted in good health and internal balance. Tap into the power of natural therapies, diet and lifestyle to restore a healthy cycle and feel your best. scroll 3 ways to help you 2 Cosmetic Acupuncture Cosmetic Acupuncture is a unique style of acupuncture stimulates production stress. Get personalized We'll discuss your current situation and a based on your unique needs and you will receive your first session. 3. Start feeling better Your plan may include moxibustion, cupping, acupuncture, herbs & bodywork to help restore your body's natural balance at its own rhythm. How do I work? Hi, I'm Julie Millour, PhD, acupuncturist & nutritionist and I love empowering women. Chinese medicine has taught me that balance is essential for good health. I love the idea that taking good care of yourself - giving your body what it needs - is the real foundation of health and happiness. When your body is in balance, you sleep well, you digest properly and you radiate life. Ready for that journey? Let's go together! About me Blog 5-star Google reviews I am grateful for every patient who takes the time to leave a review. Below are a few, but you can [click here](https://www.google.com/search?q=Julie+Millour&rlz=1C1PRUI_esES941ES941&oq=juli&aqs=chrome.1.69i60j69i59j69i60l2j69i61j69i60j69i65l2.2016j0j7&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8#lrd=0xd72f78b8199c973:0x1d60ad973ac8b92f,1,,,) to read them all on Google. I was treated for a hormonal imbalance with Julie, as well as some emotional symptoms and I felt very relieved, I always felt calm and besides the fact that acupuncture is a painless process (as opposed to what I could imagine) she is an excellent alternative health professional. - Kat - Julie is a great professional. Very attentive and involved in her treatments. I am very happy with the results I obtained with acupuncture and phytotherapy treatments I am following with her. I recommend 100%. - Mer - bottom of page
